column2: Henkel CEO downplays Wella takeover speculation - paperUPDATE 1-Henkel CEO downplays Wella takeover speculation - paper FRANKFURT
column3: June 13 The chief executive of Henkel & Co KGaA AG poured cold water on speculation the consumer goods maker was preparing to buy hair care firm Wella from Procter & Gamble Co
column4: saying his company didn't need big acquisitions to grow.  UPDATE 1-Henkel CEO downplays Wella takeover speculation - paper FRANKFURT
